TU Delft hosts several initiatives related to Artificial Intelligence:

-   [Digital Ethics Centre for fair and safe AI](https://www.tudelft.nl/digital-ethics-centre) (see [announcement of the launch](https://www.tudelft.nl/en/2022/tu-delft/tu-delft-has-launched-the-digital-ethics-centre-for-fair-and-safe-ai))

-   [TU Delft AI Labs](https://www.tudelft.nl/ai/tu-delft-ai-labs)

    -   [ChemE AI lab](https://www.tudelft.nl/ai/cheme-lab)

    -   [BIOLab](https://www.tudelft.nl/ai/biolab)

    -   [IRIS Lab](https://www.tudelft.nl/ai/iris)

-   [AI mail list](https://listserv.tudelft.nl/mailman/listinfo/ai)

-   [Eliška Greplová](https://www.tudelft.nl/en/stories/articles/using-artificial-intelligence-to-eye-the-quantum-computer) (QN)

-   [Qian Tao](https://www.tudelft.nl/en/staff/q.tao/) (ImPhys)

-   [Kristin Grußmayer](https://www.tudelft.nl/tnw/over-faculteit/afdelingen/bionanoscience/about-the-department/dr-kristin-grussmayer) (BN)

-   [Zoltán Perkó](https://www.tudelft.nl/tnw/over-faculteit/afdelingen/radiation-science-technology/research/research-groups/reactor-physics-and-nuclear-materials/people/zoltan-perko) (RST)

-   [Daan Brinks](https://www.brinkslab.org/) (ImPhys)
